text: Kodungallur Bhagavathi is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by C Baby, starring Jose Prakash and Jagannatha Varma in the lead roles. http://www.metromatinee.com/MovieStills/Kodungalloor%20Bhagavathi-3312-1 ==Cast== * Beena * Jose Prakash * Jagannadha Varma * Mala Aravindan * Paravoor Bharathan * TG Ravi * Thrissur Elsy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Kodungallur Bhagavathi
